s.text: Wait, sorry: Someone's filled with something, but it's not me and it's not joy.
Heston: There simply are no greater stories to tell.
He'll have to, suggests James Adams, a predecessor, who calls UPI a "sclerotic, corrupted organization" staffed by "tired hacks."

Of course, the interesting detail--interesting in the sense of causing shrieking head pain--is not the trivial poop that's included (the deaths of Linda McCartney, Mark McGwire, and Sammy Sosa due to an overdose of Viagra, if I read correctly--and I don't) but what's excluded.
"When I get too jaded by living in the city, I always find it refreshing to visit John Deere, where I realize I can't identify half the implements featured on the page."
